heading: 7 slain in shooting
subheading: an employee of xerox corp. shot seven co-workers to death early tuesday in honolulu before fleeing in a company van, police said. the suspect, identified as byron uesugi, who works in the technical services division, abandoned the vehicle a short distance away and fled on foot. he remains at large. another xerox building in downtown honolulu was evacuated as a precaution, in case uesugi is headed that way, police said. the shooting occurred around 8 a.m. local time.
author: wired staff
text: an employee of xerox corp. shot seven co-workers to death early tuesday in honolulu before fleeing in a company van, police said. the suspect, identified as byron uesugi, who works in the technical services division, abandoned the vehicle a short distance away and fled on foot. he remains at large. another xerox building in downtown honolulu was evacuated as a precaution, in case uesugi is headed that way, police said. the shooting occurred around 8 a.m. local time.
